summary: E-commerce/site UI updates: rename header category label to “Our Products”, make dropdown background transparent, and show the relevant category carousel (configured in admin) at the top of each product page.

existing_features.title: Update the header navigation dropdown label from “Categories” to “Our Products”.
Make the header dropdown menu background transparent (the dropdown box itself).

Add a persistent category identifier to products so the app can determine a product’s relevant category for category carousel display. Ensure this category value is editable in the admin product management flow and is returned by product APIs.

On the product detail page, render only the category carousel(s) for the product’s relevant category (as configured via the existing admin category carousel management) at the top of the page content.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the header dropdown box background transparent
On each product page, display the carousel for the product’s relevant category (as configured in admin) at the top of the page

projectName: Rename header dropdown to “Our Products”, make dropdown transparent, and show relevant category carousel on product pages
